reference.ref: Gamberger, D., Lavrac, N., Groselj C. (1999). Experiments with noise filtering in a medical domain, Proc. of 16th ICML, pp. 143-151, San Francisco, CA.

generalDescription.objective: To remove noisy instances from the training data.
generalDescription.howWork: It removes noisy instances from the training data by means of wrong predictions of a K-NN or C45 classifier.

parameterSpec.param: numPartitions: number of partitions of the training set.
classifier: to choose between knn or c45.
numNeighbors: for K-NN algorithm, the number of neighbors.
distanceType: for K-NN algorithm, the distance type.
